textos_fuente.text: contact | My Lakeview Village The Project The Lakeview Experience The Lakeview Experience Pier & Waterfront Lakeview Square Arts & Culture Innovation District Smart & Sustainable Parks & Outdoor Spaces Our Stories & Articles Discovery Centre Our Stories and Articles Contact Us Thank you for your interest in Lakeview Village. Please use this form to get in touch with us. We will respond as soon as we can. First Name Last Name Email Phone Inquiry Type General Info Sales Opportunities Community Events & Discovery Centre Media/PR Retail & New Business Opportunities Message Maximum message length is 255 characters. If your request is longer, please email us directly at info@mylakeviewvillage.com Yes, I would like to receive email communications from Lakeview Village and their partners. Connection, Canandaigua Home About Us Board of Directors & Staff Share Finger Lakes Visitors Connection Team Alicia Richie Quinn, CDME President & CEO Leads FLVC as the destination marketing management organization for Ontario County. Oversees the strategic direction and long-term vision for promoting the region. Alicia@VisitFingerLakes.com (585) 394-3915 ext. 356 Tracey Burkey, CDME Vice President of Destination Development Leads meetings, conventions, and group sales efforts to attract business to the region. Supports destination development initiatives that enhance visitor offerings. Tracey@VisitFingerLakes.com (585) 394-3915 ext. 353 Jessica VanDeMar Marketing Director Develops and implements innovative marketing strategies to drive tourism and brand visibility. Jessica@VisitFingerLakes.com (585) 394-3915 Carolina Taylor PR & Communications Manager Manages media relations to build awareness and engagement, and creates content to tell the Ontario County's story. Carolina@VisitFingerLakes.com (585) 394-3915 Chloe Davis Partner Engagement Coordinator Acts as the primary point of contact for community and tourism partners. Develops and delivers partnership programs, training, and educational resources. Chloe@VisitFingerLakes.com (585) 394-3915 Jaynee Straw Administrative Assistant Provides support for daily operations and visitor services. Jaynee@VisitFingerLakes.com (585) 394-3915 Board of Directors Members of our Board of Directors complete a self-evaluation annually. Twice grilled for extra crispiness! Buckaroo $9.55 Fresca tortilla lightly grilled and loaded with scrambled eggs, tri-tip steak, jalapenos, havarti cheese, hash browns and our house made salsa Sandwiches Breakfast Sandwich $7.25 Your choice of sausage, bacon, or ham, with cheddar cheese and fluffy scrambled eggs, nestled between toasted stone ground hearty wheat bread or an English muffin Breakfast Pita $7.23 A warm grilled pita wrapped around crispy bacon, an over medium egg and American & Swiss cheese, with mayo, lettuce, and tomato More Options Biscuits & Gravy Half - $5.63 / Whole - $8.15 House made morning comfort food! Only) $18.99 Clams in garlic wine butter broth, with baguette slices Salads Dressings: Ranch, Blue Cheese, Honey Mustard, Italian, Raspberry Vinaigrette, or 1000 Island Chicken Caesar Salad $12.99 Crispy romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, grilled chicken, and homemade croutons Tri Tip Salad $13.99 Juicy beer marinated tri tip on a bed of romaine with shredded cheddar cheese, olives, tomatoes, red onions, cucumber and garlic croutons BBQ Chicken Ranch Salad $12.99 Crispy romaine lettuce topped with shredded cheese, tomatoes, red onion, tortilla strips, corn, black beans, grilled chicken, with strips of BBQ and ranch dressing Fruit Balsamic Chicken Salad $13.99 Grilled chicken, glazed walnuts, seasonal fruit, blue cheese crumbles, and red onions served on a bed of lettuce with balsamic dressing House Salad Side - $3.99 / Whole - $8.99 Romaine lettuce topped with red onions, olives, parmesan cheese, diced tomatoes and croutons Specialty Pitas Served with your choice of chips, tots, fries, sweet potato fries or salad. Substitute onion rings for $1.79. House Marinated Tri Tip $12.99 Grilled tri tip and onions with melted crumbled blue cheese on top of a soft warmed pita with garlic mayo Chicken & Cheese $12.99 Grilled chicken and onions with melted cheese n top of a soft warmed pita with garlic mayo Turkey Bacon $11.49 Layers of lettuce, Swiss cheese, tomato, house ranch, and mayo, with a pile of turkey & bacon BLTA $11.99 4 pieces of Daily's bacon layered with tomatoes, avocado and lettuce on a warmed pita with mayo Char-Broiled Served with your choice of chips, tots, fries, sweet potato fries or salad. Substitute onion rings for $1.79. Lakeview Lounge Lobby Restaurant & Bar - Chateau Lake Louise Skip to main content We’re putting the finishing touches on the exciting new addition of BASIN Glacial Waters , our state-of-the-art, eco-friendly thermal bathing experience. While major construction is now complete, guests may notice some remaining work in progress—including final landscaping—through early fall. Please note, while renovations are in progress, our team is working diligently to minimize any disruption to your stay. We appreciate your understanding and patience as we work to make Fairmont Chateau Lake Louise an even more exceptional destination. 2 + Children - 0 + Accessible Room Required Check Rates Check Rates Close Check In Check Out Guests Adults - 2 + Children - 0 + Accessible Room Required Add A Promo Code Check Rates Lakeview Lounge & Summer Patio Experience our iconic lobby lounge and summer patio. Wine, dine, mix, and mingle in style over Rocky Mountain-infused craft cocktails. Lakeview Lounge is the resort’s iconic restaurant and bar. Enjoy delicious foods as you take in world-famous views of Lake Louise and Victoria Glacier. During the summer months, soak up the fresh mountain air and surrounding beauty from one of the most scenic patios in the Canadian Rockies. Please note: Destination visitors to Lake Louise are able to join us in The Lakeview Lounge for lunch, with reservations required. Full master wine list Savour Summer on a Patio Indulge in lakeside dining with million-dollar views of Lake Louise and the Victoria Glacier on our iconic Lakeview Patio. Perfect for intimate meals or gatherings with friends, sit back and relax and take in the sites on the shore of Lake Louise. Exclusive Offers and Updates from Chateau Lake Louise Subscribe Today With humility and deep respect, we acknowledge that we live and work within the present-day territories of Treaty 6, 7 and 8, as well as the Métis Homeland. The lands and waters of Banff National Park have been used for millennia by Indigenous Peoples for sustenance, ceremony, trade and travel.
